title: NETWORK_CLAN_GET_MEMBERSHIP_VALID
content:
0x48A59CF88D43DF0E0x48914F6A// NetworkClanGetMembershipValid
BOOL NETWORK_CLAN_GET_MEMBERSHIP_VALID(int* networkHandle, int membershipIndex);Parameters:networkHandle: A player network handle.membershipIndex: If the player has multiple crews/memberships, use [0-9], or -1 to get the active crew/membership.Returns: Returns true if valid, false otherwise.Checks if a crew/membership for a player, from the cache (i.e. downloaded via NETWORK_CLAN_DOWNLOAD_MEMBERSHIP) is valid.
codeBlocks:
// NetworkClanGetMembershipValid
BOOL NETWORK_CLAN_GET_MEMBERSHIP_VALID(int* networkHandle, int membershipIndex);
